showScoreExcerpt:
"Designed strictly as a package tour for Jimmy Buffett fans â€“ aka Parrotheads...They can rest assured that the song list retains all their favorites...Even with some retooling and new additions, the score can't bear the twin burdens of storytelling and character illumination...This is basically a greatest hits collection in search of a musical...The book combines tired gags with a trio of pro forma romances...The jokes will have you wondering exactly what the writers were smoking."
